```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source("read.cnv.files.R")
```

## read cnv file:

```{r cars}
df.1 <- read.cnv.file("example data/V0001F01.cnv")
df.2 <- read.cnv.file("example data/P0009F01.cnv")

head(df.1)
head(df.2)
```

## Plot


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=4}
library("reshape2")
melted.df.1 <- melt(df.1,
                  id.vars = c("depSM", "scan", "nbin",
                              "flag", "timeS", "nbf",
                              "altM", "prDM",
                              "header.latitude", "header.longitude"
                              ))

melted.df.2 <- melt(df.2,
                  id.vars = c("depSM", "scan", "nbin",
                              "flag", "timeS", "nbf",
                              "altM", "prDM", "spar",
                              "header.latitude", "header.longitude",
                              "latitude", "longitude"
                              ))

library("ggplot2")
ggplot(melted.df.1,
       aes(x = depSM, y = value)) +
    geom_line() +
    scale_x_reverse() +
    coord_flip() +
    facet_grid(.~variable, scales = "free") +
    theme_bw() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

ggplot(melted.df.2,
       aes(x = depSM, y = value)) +
    geom_line() +
    scale_x_reverse() +
    coord_flip() +
    facet_grid(.~variable, scales = "free") +
    theme_bw() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
